alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 6:12PM PDT until August 11 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Elko County in northeastern Nevada... * Until midnight PDT. * At 612 PM PDT, emergency management reported flash flooding in Lamoille Canyon. Between 0.4 and 0.7 inches of rain have fallen. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lamoille Canyon. The road up Lamoille Canyon has been closed approximately half way up the canyon due to a debris flow. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
